name: What the Pho: Roguelike restaurant startup
name_original: What the Pho: Roguelike restaurant startup
description:
What the Pho: Roguelike restaurant startup! is an upcoming cooking/simulation game about creating your own dream restaurant, participate in competition and become the best chef in the city.

---------------------------------------------------------

Progress update - Full update logs can be found in the project website.

15th Sep 2020: Forth update. Updates after six months. Food processor, lots of refactors, some new art, and planning to change the game to 3d!



20th Mar 2020: Third update. First demo to people ever. Buying and selling of kitchenwares. Steam page is up!



10th Feb 2020: 4 months later and my second update. Customer to serve, an actual restaurant layout.



11th Aug 2019: My very first update: What have I achieved after 3 months?



---------------------------------------------------------

Design the layout, choose what food to serve in the menu, buy ingredients, prepare the meal, deliver it to the customer, make money and clean up the mess. Play either solo or coop with up to 4 players





SIMPLE CONTROLS/DEEP CHALLENGE

What the Pho's control is simple yet effective, so that it is so easy to pick up that anyone can join in the fun and help you with your busy restaurant, as well as a special challenging arcade mode that support up to 4 players!

The game supports mouse/keyboard play many popular standard controllers, including Steam Controller, Xbox (one, 360) controllers, ps2/ps3/ps4 controller and even steering wheel.
